comments:
Eclipse 200303062359
RH 8.0

New workspace
Turn automatic compile off
From CVS retreive org.eclipse.swt, org.eclipse.swt.motif, platform-core,
platform-ui and platform-ui-examples
Import required plug-ins as source
Import org.eclipse.xerseces as binary
Turn on compile.

Make a change in PropertySheetViewer (add a println to handleSelect).
Now try and launch a debug session.

Error was while accessing:
/home/airvine/ide/workspace_motif_R2.1/org.eclipse.ui/icons/full/ctool16/saveall_edit.gif

Remove this gif and launch succeeded.

There is a difference in size between the .gif extracted from CVS and that of
the one in my install directory.  The install directory has _orig added to the name.
-rw-r--r--    1 airvine  ottawa        186 May 23  2001 saveall_edit.gif
-rw-r--r--    1 airvine  ottawa        187 Mar  7 15:39 saveall_edit_orig.gif

Substitute saveall_edit_orig.gif for saveall_edit.gif and the workbench opens.
*** Bug 34148 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This has been fixed by the CVS team in RC2 build (I200303071024)
Andrew, did you get a bug number for the fixed problem?

Unfortunately no.  I'll have to check with Kevin McGuire on Monday, I couldn't 
find it in bugzilla
